definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: This month Iran arrested several more bloggers.

sentences.english: Ablett will depart after the International Cor Groenewegen Tournament in Holland this weekend.

sentences.english: The state-run China Securities Journal was more cautious, saying a rate hike is likely this month [zh].

sentences.english: Steadman gave birth to a healthy baby girl earlier this month.

sentences.english: Dick and I are to be married at Christ Church at noon on Thursday, the tenth.

sentences.english: Uranus will also go direct this month.

sentences.english: On March 11, Saudi Consulate in Karachi who have been attacked two grenades.

sentences.english: This month features a photo of David Alcaide and Michaela Tabb at the World Cup of Pool.

sentences.english: Its mandate is due to expire next month, but it is expected to be renewed. 0 M7 V% V.

sentences.english: The bridge is scheduled to be put into operation at the end of this month.

sentences.english: ASEAN is scheduled for March 22 to discuss the Thai-Cambodian border dispute.
sentences.chinese: 东盟定于本月22日讨论泰柬边界争端。

sentences.english: The book will be released on the January 26 Australia Day holiday, which c ommemorates the landing of the first  fleet on Australian shores in 1788.
